mapper.insert: insert into V_HIS_CLINIC_PATIENT_INFO (PATIENT_ID, OUTPATIENT_NO, DEPT_CODE, DEPT_NAME, PATIENT_NAME, SEX, DATE_OF_BIRTH, AREA_NAME, COUNTRY_NAME, NATION, ID_NO, IDENTITY_STR, MAILING_ADDRESS, ZIP_CODE, NEXT_OF_KIN, RELATIONSHIP_NAME, NEXT_OF_KIN_ADDR, NEXT_OF_KIN_PHONE, OCCUPATION, MARITAL_STATUS, INSURANCE_TYPE, INSURANCE_NO, VISITED_DATE_TIME, DIAGNOSIS_CODE, DIAGNOSIS_NAME, DOCTOR_NAME, DOCTOR_CODE, CHARGE_TYPE, VIP_INDICATOR, MEDICAL_INSURANCE_CARD_NO, SOCIAL_SECURITY_CARD_NO, PASSPORT_NO, BLOOD_TYPE, RH_BLOOD_TYPE, WORK_UNIT, PHONE_NUMBER, E_MAIL, PAT_CONDITION_NAME) values (#{patientId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{outpatientNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deptCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deptName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{patientName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dateOfBirth,jdbcType=DATE}, #{areaName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{countryName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{nation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{idNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{identityStr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mailingAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{zipCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{nextOfKin,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{relationshipName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{nextOfKinAddr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{nextOfKinPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{occupation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{maritalStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{insuranceType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{insuranceNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{visitedDateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{diagnosisCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{diagnosisName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{doctorName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{doctorCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{chargeType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{vipIndicator,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{medicalInsuranceCardNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{socialSecurityCardNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{passportNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bloodType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rhBloodType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{workUnit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phoneNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{eMail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{patConditionName,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})
mapper.select: select PATIENT_ID, OUTPATIENT_NO, DEPT_CODE, DEPT_NAME, PATIENT_NAME, SEX, DATE_OF_BIRTH, AREA_NAME, COUNTRY_NAME, NATION, ID_NO, IDENTITY_STR, MAILING_ADDRESS, ZIP_CODE, NEXT_OF_KIN, RELATIONSHIP_NAME, NEXT_OF_KIN_ADDR, NEXT_OF_KIN_PHONE, OCCUPATION, MARITAL_STATUS, INSURANCE_TYPE, INSURANCE_NO, VISITED_DATE_TIME, DIAGNOSIS_CODE, DIAGNOSIS_NAME, DOCTOR_NAME, DOCTOR_CODE, CHARGE_TYPE, VIP_INDICATOR, MEDICAL_INSURANCE_CARD_NO, SOCIAL_SECURITY_CARD_NO, PASSPORT_NO, BLOOD_TYPE, RH_BLOOD_TYPE, WORK_UNIT, PHONE_NUMBER, E_MAIL, PAT_CONDITION_NAME from V_HIS_CLINIC_PATIENT_INFO
